titleStmt.title: Tvvo fruitful sermons, needfull for these times whereof the one may be called, A mariage present; the other, A sickemans glasse. Compiled by Roger Hacket, Doctor in Diuinitie.
Two fruitful sermons, needfull for these times.
titleStmt.author: Hacket, Roger, 1559-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Cuthburt Burby,

notesStmt.note: Folger Shakespeare Library copy has note at end that at one time this item was bound with thirteen other items, of which the first was STC 11581.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
